price: 35. dan agar orang-orang yang membantah tanda-tanda (kekuasaan) Kami mengetahui bahwa mereka tidak akan memperoleh jalan keluar (dari siksaan).
arabic: وَيَعۡلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مَا لَهُم مِّن مَّحِيصٖ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayaʿlama alladhīna yujādilūna fī āyātinā mā lahum min maḥīṣin
